turns.text: Well what I believe is one of the major pro- uh things that is wrong with our public school system is that um we do not have enough discipline --
turns.label: sv

turns.text: -- and the parents do not let the teachers discipline the children the way that they need to be --
turns.label: sv

turns.text: Uh when I went to school I know I was scared to death --
turns.label: sd

turns.text: -- about being disciplined and the discipline that my daughter receives now --
-- in going to school is just totally different
You know you just you did not see I did not see anybody in my classrooms when I was going to school act up the way that kids do --
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Yeah yeah From what I understand they act up pretty bad
turns.label: aa

turns.text: What uh grade is your daughter in
turns.label: qw

turns.text: My my daughters in the um fourth grade --
turns.label: sd

turns.text: -- and um theres children in her classroom that just totally disrupt --
turns.label: sd

turns.text: -- the classroom where the teacher cannot teach --
-- and when I went to school that just wasnt put up with
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Oh no uh-huh They always had paddle in our school
turns.label: aa

turns.text: uh-huh Well they they just dont do that any more
turns.label: b

turns.text: But the school systems afraid of getting sued --
turns.label: sv

turns.text: -- and um all sorts of lawsuits Im sure because of things like that
And I also believe we dont even though I feel like I pay good share towards the school system that the teachers are still underpaid and we still dont have enough money towards --
turns.label: sv

turns.text: And um I think that if we had enough money and paid the teachers little bit more that maybe that could solve some of our problems
turns.label: sv

turns.text: Yeah Wasnt that what part of the lottery is going to go for if we --
turns.label: aa

turns.text: -- supposedly thats what its suppose to go for and --
turns.label: sd^e

turns.text: -- you know well just have to wait and see whether thats approved or not You know I dont know your feelings toward that I guess we shouldnt get into that but um and what else um I think in some ways that they need to be more careful of the teachers that they hire
I have heard stories uh from other parents that I know of their children are in high school --
turns.label: sd

turns.text: -- that teachers are out there giving drugs and selling drugs
Ive Ive heard some horrible horrible stories about high high school teachers --
turns.label: sd

turns.text: -- and you know to be be more careful of the teachers that we place in our school -
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Um thats basically about all that I know that may be wrong with the school system I think with what they have to work with I think theyre doing pretty good job right now
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Oh I do too I think theyre doing real good job
turns.label: aa

turns.text: But then what do I know --
turns.label: qh

turns.text: You dont have any children in school
turns.label: qy@

turns.text: Yeah okay so this is probably real hard subject for you
turns.label: bk

turns.text: Yeah Okay well I guess um we can discontinue our call now
